sql.query: select "user"."id" as "id", "user"."phone", "r"."name", "r"."adminView", "r"."mobileView", "r"."facilityView", "user"."countryCode" from "user" left join "detailsUser" as "du" on "du"."userId" = "user"."id" left join "roles" as "r" on "r"."id" = "du"."rolesId" where "user"."phone" = ? and "user"."countryCode" = ?
select "client"."customerId", "u".* from "client" inner join "user" as "u" on "u"."id" = "client"."userId" where "u"."id" = ?
select "r"."name" from "detailsUser" inner join "roles" as "r" on "r"."id" = "detailsUser"."rolesId" where "detailsUser"."userId" = ?
